title: Kinder chocolate muffins
ingredients: ['125g butter', '125g sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 eggs', '300 g flour', '2 level teaspoons baking powder', '1 pinch salt', '150ml milk', '100g Kinder Chocolate, cut into small pieces', 'For the icing (optional)', '50-100g Kinder chocolate', 'Smarties or chocolate buttons as a decoration']
